alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:55PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN RIPLEY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...SOUTHERN UNION COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA...NORTHEASTERN DEARBORN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...SOUTHERN FAYETTE COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA... HAMILTON...BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO THROUGH 330 PM EST... At 254 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Rushville to Williamsdale, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Fairfield, Mason, Oxford, Norwood, Forest Park, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Trenton, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Harrison, North College Hill, Madeira, Wyoming, and Cheviot. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 4 and 22. I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 145 and 171. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 4 and 25. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
